details: **Actions Runner Controller (ARC) Documentation**: Restructured ARC articles into a new `tutorials` section, added a new concept file for runner scale sets, and updated navigation.
**PKCE Support**: Added documentation for Proof Key for Code Exchange (PKCE) in GitHub Apps and OAuth Apps authorization flows.
**GitHub Pages**: Clarified visibility rules for Enterprise Managed Users (EMUs).
**Copilot Tutorial**: Added a hands-on exercise link for Model Context Protocol (MCP) integration.
